title: Shootmania Storm Full +  Trackmania 2 Stadium Beta LAN mode
description:
Shootmania Full + Trackmania 2 Stadium BETA

Its full, its working, both game in LAN mode


How to get it work:(DO EXACTLY AS IT WRITES!!)

1.Shootmania: Install from iso map 'TelepÃƒÂ­tÃ…â€˜k' ShootmaniaOpenBeta.exe file with custom paths to here:

                     C:GamesSMSTORM1Maniaplanet <- Maniaplanet
                     C:GamesSMSTORM2Maniaplanet <- Userdata
                     C:GamesSMSTORM3Maniaplanet <- Shared program data

2.TM2 Stadium Beta: Install from folder 'TelepÃƒÂ­tÃ…â€˜k'StadiumOpenBeta.exe file with custom directory paths to here:

                     C:GamesSMSTORM4Maniaplanet <- Maniaplanet
                     C:GamesSMSTORM5Maniaplanet <- UserData
                     C:GamesSMSTORM6Maniaplanet <- Cache and program data


3. If you done then from the BemÃƒÂ¡solni/ folder, extract "SMSTORM FULL + STADIUM BETA.rar" file onto the already existing C:GamesSmstorm folder. It will be correct when it asks to overwrite!

4. Search your hosts file in c:windowssystem32driversetchosts  then edit it and add theese lines at the end of the file:

127.0.0.1 mp02.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 mp01.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 mp03.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 mp04.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 mp05.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 init.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 flags.trackmaniaforever.com
127.0.0.1 menu.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 pluginslb.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 livemenulb.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 files.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 files2.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 files3.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 files4.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 files5.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 files0.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 files1.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 static.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 game.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 tm.maniazones.com

4.After this you can start the both game from separate places:
 
Shootmania C:GAMESSmstorm1ManiaplanetLauncher.exe

Stadium C:GAMESSmstorm4ManiaplanetLauncher.exe


Know this: It will has only offline profile and LAN mode, you can use
EVERY custom gamemode and skin in lan! You can ad edit remove tracks/maps,
it has NOT have any dedicated server.


Have a good game  :D
